PathOfBuilding.Notes:
> ^x00FFFFForum Guide:^7 https://www.pathofexile.com/forum/view-thread/2661120 > ^x00FFFFDiscord / Twitch / YouTube:^7 https://discord.gg/tkzCFtN | https://www.twitch.tv/shakcentral | https://www.youtube.com/c/ShakCentral
> ^6Skill Trees^7
> There are 5 leveling trees and a lvl 80, 90, and 100 skill tree. Select trees using the dropdown menu on the bottom of the Tree tab.
> ^6Life Flask Tip^7
> Do not craft a suffix onto your life flask. If the flask only has a prefix, you will only be able to use the flask when you are actually missing life.
> ^6General Leveling Notes^7
> In the early acts you can craft a needed resistance for 1 transmute at your hideout crafting bench. > If you need Transmutes, sell items unidentified. If you need Alterations, ID them first. > Don't worry too much about having perfect links while leveling. Use what you have, adjust where you can, and keep moving. > As your sockets fill up, don't forget you can level gems in your "off-hand" weapons for 6 extra sockets. > This is especially useful for leveling gems that aren't being used until later Acts or the Endgame (Auras, 5L/6L Supports, etc)
> ^6Vendor Recipe^7
> The flat damage to spells recipe is gone. However, there is still a valuable recipe for DoT builds: > Selling a wand (any rarity) + 1 Blacksmith's Whetstone + 1 Chain Belt will give a wand with % increased spell damage. > The Chain Belt can be Magic, Rare, or Unique; higher rarity belts will give higher spell damage rolls, but require higher levels to use.
> ^6Leveling Gems^7
> ^xFF6600Act 1^7 > Lvls 2-4: Stormblast + Swift Assembly | Freezing Pulse + Arcane Surge > Lvl 4-12: Drop Freezing Pulse. Add Frost Bomb | Arcane Surge + Frostblink > At Prison WP, link Added Lightning to Stormblast and buy Efficacy > After Brutus get Clarity, buy Vitality and Flame Dash, and drop Frostblink > Lvl 12: Creeping Frost + Efficacy
> ^xFF6600Act 2^7 > Lvl 16: Get Skitterbots & Cold Snap. > Lvl 18: Get Elemental Focus, Trap&Mine Damage, and 2x Controlled Destruction. > Replace Swift Assembly w/ Trap&Mine, and link Cold DoT skills as you're able.
> ^xFF6600Act 3^7 > Lvl 24: Get Frostbite, Elemental Weakness, and Bane. > Use Ele Weakness as your lvling curse until you drop Stormblast. > Lvl 28: Get Vortex. Keep Stormblast until after Piety fight (her portals are bugged) > Siosa / Lvl 31 - Buy as currency allows: Determination, Grace, Molten Shell, 2x Swift Affliction, Hypothermia > Once you have 2 4-links, it's a good time to switch to full Cold DoT.
> ^xFF6600Bonechill and CWDT are purchased in Act 4. See the Skills tab for links once you swap to full Cold DoT^7 > Stormblast can be used for extra single target DPS as long as desired/needed. > Drop Vitality once you have more comfortable defenses and regen. > Aura importance while leveling: Clarity > Determination > Malevolence > Grace > Swapping to a Shield will lose some DPS but lead to a much faster movement ability.
> ^6Crafting Tips^7
> ^xFF6600Off-Color Socket Trick^7 > If you need 2-4 off-colors on a 4-socket item with high attribute requirements (i.e. non-^x70FF70G^7s on Atziri's Step), DON'T SPAM CHROMES! > Put the item in your crafting bench. set it to 2 sockets, and use the bench to color them as needed (either 15 or 25 Chromes). > If you need more off-colors, set it to 3 sockets. If you don't hit the color, go back and forth between 2-3 sockets until you do. > This method uses mostly Jewellers and saves a lot of currency.
> ^xFF6600Endgame Wand^7 1. Obtain an ilvl 2 Driftwood Wand from the Coast. 2. Spam Deafening Essences of Woe for "+1 to level of all Cold Spell Skill Gems". > If you're ok with a lower Spell Damage modifier, SSF players can use Shrieking / Screaming Woes. 3. Use Orbs of Annulment to try for an open prefix AND suffix. If you annul Spell Damage or the +1 Gems, start again at step 2. 4. Craft "Prefixes cannot be changed". Use a Scouring Orb to remove all suffixes, leaving a rare wand with only 2 prefixes. 5. Craft "Can have up to 3 Crafted Modifiers", then "18-20% Cold DoT Multi" and "21-30% increased DoT". 6. Wand has 1 open mod. Get a Fenumus beast via trade / Einhar missions and fight it to craft "Aspect of the Spider" if you want it.
> ^xFF6600Cluster Jewels^7 > LARGES: 8 passives, "12% Cold Damage", ideally ilvl 49 or lower. > ^2SSF Note:^7 If you don't have a Cold large, there are good Notables on Spell / Elemental / Fire / Lightning damage clusters. > You want Deep Chill, Prismatic Heart, and any relevant 3rd Notable if possible. Use Frigid Fossils or Harvest Cold reforges.
> MEDIUMS: 4-5 passives, "10% Damage over Time" (easier to roll than Cold DoT), ilvl 68+ > Alt Spam for Brush with Death. Rolling a good 2nd Notable (Vile Reinvig or Deep Chill) is expensive (>1000 Alt average).
> SMALLS: 2 passives, "15% Armour" (for Endurance Charges) or "6% Energy Shield" (for either ES on Kill or high ES total), ilvl 68+ > Alt spam for Enduring Composure (Armour), Brush with Death (ES), or Energy from Naught (ES).
